experience: You and Josh both know Bart Rupert, Jonathan Cottrell, and 29 others

Bonefish Software LLC is a small custom software development and consulting firm. We specialize in web-based solutions built on leading edge technology. We have extensive experience in a number of industries and technical disciplines.

Developed numerous landing pages for the front of site (GoDaddy.com sales site) along with continuous maintenance and updates to pages using technologies such as Visual Studio 2010, C# .NET, LINQ, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, XML, JSON* Built a CDS (content delivery service): a RESTful web service that delivers JSON content* Built a custom CMS that dynamically loads content into custom widgets as defined in the JSON* Built a CDSM (content delivery system management UI) used to manage the json content stored MongoDB* Completed large-scale multi-currency conversion projects in the front of site (GoDaddy.com and My Account public facing web applications)* Redesigned the central navigation for front of site (GoDaddy.com, My Account, Cart, & Videos sites)* Built internal tools used by other developers such as:** code-check tool for surface-level code review and validation, ensuring that coding standards were followed and common code issues were avoided. The rules were developed with regular expressions and downloaded at runtime; rules are easily modified and maintained by peers** CSS & JavaScript deployment tool that sanitizes CSS and JavaScript, performs validation and  minification for DEV/TEST and PROD environments

Software development, support, and maintenance of internal and external facing applications including custom manufacturing software, ERP integration, Intranet, Supplier Extranet, Customer Extranet, B2B integration projects and many other internal software development projects.  Additional responsibilities include SQL Server database development, maintenance and administration, source code revision control administration (Subversion), ERP maintenance and other general IT administration tasks.

Eric is a very talented UI/UX professional. I worked on many projects with Eric and can tell you that he always delivers high quality UI/UX. He works well in a team setting and with clients. He has picked up HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery and other technologies to provide lots of value to his teams and clients. I'd love to work with Eric again and can say that he'd be a great addition to any team or organization.
